member.summary: Responsible for reading the input file and splitting the ZPL labels.

member.summary: Reads the file and returns its content.

member.name: M:ZPL2PDF.LabelFileReader.SplitLabels(System.String)
member.summary: Splits the content into a list of ZPL labels based on the delimiters "^XA" and "^XZ".

member.name: T:ZPL2PDF.LabelRenderer
member.summary: Responsible for processing labels, generating images in memory, and returning image data.

member.name: M:ZPL2PDF.LabelRenderer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the LabelRenderer class, setting up the necessary dependencies for rendering labels into images.

member.name: M:ZPL2PDF.LabelRenderer.RenderLabels(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Processes a list of ZPL labels and returns a list of images (in byte[]).
member.returns: List of images in byte arrays.

member.name: T:ZPL2PDF.PdfGenerator
member.summary: Responsible for generating a PDF, adding each image (byte[] data) to a page.

member.name: M:ZPL2PDF.PdfGenerator.GeneratePdf(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Byte[]},System.String)
member.summary: Generates a PDF with one image per page and saves the file to the specified path.
member.param: List of image data in byte arrays.
Path to save the generated PDF file.

member.name: T:ZPL2PDF.Program
member.summary:
Main program for converting ZPL to PDF.
The program requires the following parameters: 1. Input file path: Specified with the -i parameter. 2. Output folder path: Specified with the -o parameter.
The output file name can be specified using the -n parameter. If not specified, the PDF file name will be "ZPL2PDF_DDMMYYYYHHMM.pdf". Alternatively, the ZPL content can be provided directly using the -z parameter.
